Good form.feedback: Good Form: The shape of the vase clearly demonstrates craftsmanship.

Poor taste.feedback: Poor Taste: Taste is in the eye of the designer as well as the viewer.

Contrasting themes.feedback: Contrasting Themes: There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to this media to imply that it is contrasting with other figures.

AI.feedback: AI: While a modification of prior work, this is still AI generative work.

Shading.feedback: Shading: While there is a light source and a shadow cast, shading is a term used for pencil based sketching.

Original work.feedback: Original Work: Artwork created from gerenateive AI can not be original since it is trained on other artists work.

Accessible.feedback: Accessible: The color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character.

Has a Hat.feedback: Has a Hat: Has a mix of brown, red and blue

Is a pig.feedback: Is a pig: Its someones pet pig.

There are flowers.feedback: There are flowers: There are some pink flowers

Is wearing a jacket.feedback: Is wearing a jacket: Is not wearing a jacket, its more of a sweater.

Wearing a hoodie.feedback: Wearing a Hoodie: The pig is wearing a pink hoodie.

Standing.feedback: Standing: The pig is standing, even though it may look like its not

Contrasting themes.feedback: Contrasting themes: There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to imply that it is contrasting.

AI.feedback: AI: This picture was taken with an iphone camera, so this is not AI generative work.

Accessible.feedback: Accessible: The color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character.
